title: Solr Admin UI: create core of named config set
description:
The Solr Admin UI makes it possible to create new cores ("Core Admin" tab, "Add Core" button). It should be possible to specify a named config set for the created core.

Currently you can only enter core name, instanceDir, dataDir and the names of solrconfig.xml
/ schema.xml.

Named config sets were introduced with SOLR-4478.
